noDataMessage: We’re still learning your immersion patterns in this time range. Keep recording your sessions, and we’ll provide personalized insights soon.

interruptions.unlocks: leaving the app during the timer
interruptions.scrolls: scrolling or switching tasks during the timer

danger: immersion stability is at high risk.
maintaining immersion is difficult right now.
stable: you’re sustaining a solid level of immersion.
good: your immersion condition is near peak.

excellent: aim to keep immersion at this level.
continue immersing at a high level.
risingStable: You're steadily improving. As you get more comfortable, try extending your immersion time little by little.
Great upward trend. Make it a goal to gradually increase your session length.
You're making good progress. It might be a good time to start lengthening your immersion sessions step by step.
You're heading in the right direction. Try increasing your immersion duration gradually.
stableHigh: continue maintaining a strong level of immersion.
keep up the steady immersion pattern.
minorImprovement: reduce {{issue}} slightly to refine your results.
a small adjustment to {{issue}} will bring you closer to optimal.
reducing {{issue}} a bit will improve overall quality.
addressing {{issue}} will further strengthen your immersion.
risingMedium: You're showing improvement! Try extending your immersion sessions step by step.
Good progress. Gradually increase your session length as you build momentum.
You're on the right track. Focus on extending your immersion time little by little.
Positive trend. Work on lengthening your immersion periods progressively.
risingWithTip: lower '{{issue}}' further to support the trend (avg {{count}} times).
risingMultiTip: focus on reducing '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times) for better immersion control.
noIssue: aim to lengthen immersion time now.
singleIssue: primary disruption: '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—work on reducing this.
'{{issue}}' is affecting your immersion (avg {{count}} times)—address this factor.
immersion loss is mostly linked to '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times).
main distraction detected: '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—prioritize improvement here.
multiIssue: lower both '{{issue1}}' (avg {{count1}}) and '{{issue2}}' (avg {{count2}}) for steadier immersion.
lowScoreNoIssue: increase session length step by step.
extend duration progressively to build stamina.
add a few more minutes to each session.
lowScoreWithIssue: your main challenge is '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times)—tackle this first.
lower the impact of '{{issue}}' (avg {{count}} times) to improve immersion results.
